topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 2.1: Open Source and Third-Party Software License Agreements

body.p: The Open Source and Third-Party Software License Agreements for HPE Helion OpenStack are available as a PDF download.

You can download the open source libraries included with Vertica at https://my.vertica.com/licenses/. You can obtain source code for other components where HPE has an obligation to or, in its sole discretion, chooses to make the source code for such components available under the applicable open source software license. Instructions on how to obtain the source code are in the PDF.
